abstract: How jobs were created in the industrial revolution and how they can be created now as well as Facebook fatigue and memo writing lessons are on this weekend’s reading list.
snippet: How jobs were created in the industrial revolution and how they can be created now as well as Facebook fatigue and memo writing lessons are on this weekend’s reading list.
lead_paragraph: Here is what the reporters and editors of The New York Times were reading this week. There is enough to amuse you and stimulate you over the July Fourth holiday weekend:
